title: Marco Rubio and President Trump Stumble Through Gun Control Debates | Lupita Nyong'o
itunes:title: Marco Rubio and President Trump Stumble Through Gun Control Debates | Lupita Nyong'o
description:
Justin Trudeau makes waves on his trip to India, Parkland survivors confront Marco Rubio and President Trump on gun control, and Lupita Nyong'o discusses "Black Panther."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
